s.text: See how smart we are, who do get it?
See how smart we are, who do get it?
The people on whose behalf David Gates is pleading--Quentin Tarantino, Lorrie Moore, Beck--would not be happy to know that their particular slant on life expresses the universal human condition.
It's funny, and it's fun, and Culturebox, for one, couldn't live without it.
At least irony is unlikely to be used to justify programmes of conquest or extermination."
At least irony is unlikely to be used to justify programmes of conquest or extermination."
At least irony is unlikely to be used to justify programmes of conquest or extermination."
Andy Kaufman would have been horrified by the implication that he was better than the people who failed to understand him, if only because that would have made him so easy to skewer.
